channel.title: Lake Coeur d'Alene Scenic Byway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Lake Coeur d'Alene Scenic Byway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-97 North - Lake Coeur d'Alene Scenic Byway
item.description: Lake Coeur d’Alene Scenic Byway at beginning of ID-97 north. Uses new style of scenic byway marker.

item.title: ID-97 North - Lake Coeur d'Alene Scenic Byway
item.description: Lake Coeur d’Alene Scenic Byway on ID-97 North. The Lake Coeur d’Alene Scenic Byway follows ID-97 from ID-3 north to I-90 along the east shore of Lake Coeur d’Alene.
